title: 8 Things You Should Know This Am
author: Tanya Edwards
description: Shakira shares baby bump family photos to help raise awareness for Unicef.
cleaned_text: Milan and long time partner Gerard Piqué, debuting her baby bump to support [Unicef's work for children](http://www.unicef.org/media/media_78722.html). Ohio Congressman Tim Ryan is on a [quest to make America more zen](http://nymag.com/daily/intelligencer/2015/01/can-this-congressman-make-america-more-zen.html), including introducing bills to add holistic and alternative-medicine programs for the treatment of veterans and to teach schoolchildren social and emotional skills through better self-awareness.
